title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item at the first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item on the first attempt.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item within the outline view.

Observed Behavior: The focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the desired label item in the outline view.

Expected Behavior: The desired label item should be successfully selected in the library outline view.
OB: The focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the desired label item in the library outline view.
EB: The desired label item should be successfully selected in the library outline view.
SR:
1. Add a label in library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the outline view.
